    • Method Detail

      • choose

        Optional<RemoteHost> choose(LoadBalancer.Preferences preferences)
        Asks the load balancer to choose a remote host.
        Parameters:
        preferences - Allows consumer to influence load balancer's decision. Whether or not the load balancer considers the requested preferences depends entirely on the load balancer implementation. Pass in 'null' to indicate no preferences.
        Returns:
        An optional of RemoteHost.

      • originsChanged

        default void originsChanged(OriginsSnapshot snapshot)
        Description copied from interface: OriginsChangeListener
        Events raised when there is a change in the current origins state.
        Specified by:
        originsChanged in interface OriginsChangeListener
        Parameters:
        snapshot - a snapshot of the current origins state.
